title: ICMR Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in for 03 Young Professional I Posts
description: The Indian Council of Medical Research (ICMR) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 03 Young Professional I Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.Sc. Nursing can apply for the ICMR Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit selection process, appli...
